Package particleSystem

Class Summary
Force A basic force class based on Repeller
based on: Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code
Particle The Particles
There are different kind of particles.
ParticleSystem the whole ParticleSystem
here the collision and stuff get worked out
based on: Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code
Path The Path the Particles can follow.
Property these are some propertys for repelling to get some sort of rules
the data is loaded from an .xml file but can also be set manually for every Property
its only for storing an int, string,float[][] with 6 values in an Object
PSUtil This Class is for helping with the ParticleSystem
they don't affect the Core Application but are very usefull
Repeller A basic Repeller class only circles that repell the Paeticles
based on: Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code
